{"step_by_step_thinking": "The patient presents with proptosis (enlargement of the eye) and pain 2 days after trauma to the eye. On examination, there is a bruise on the right eye and forehead. The patient's symptoms suggest that the injury may have affected the blood vessels or carotid artery.
